side_projects.title: Check out what I'm working on
side_projects.subtitle: Side Projects
side_projects.description: I love to work on side projects in my free time, from simple websites to complex web applications. Here are some of the projects I've worked recently.

1.name: Personal Website
1.description: This is a personal website where users can learn about my background, skills, and project experiences, and contact me directly through the site.

2.name: Omdia Conference Website
2.description: This is a website created for the Omdia conference, where users can easily access event details, session schedules, content, and speaker information, as well as register for the event.

3.name: CMS System
3.description: Developed a Content Management System (CMS) for a client using Next.js, and MongoDB. The system allows the client to manage and update content on their website easily.
